snippet.title: Gameplay Launch Trailer External
snippet.description:
Store Links
-------------------
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/17...
Microsoft Store - https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/...
Itch - https://pisces-studios.itch.io/dyflexion
Kartridge - https://www.kartridge.com/games/Pisce...

Social Links
--------------------
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/Dyflexion/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/dyflexion
IndieDB - https://www.indiedb.com/games/dyflexion

Features
--------------
    Deflect enemy projectiles back at them.
    Dodge and deflect your way through obstacles.
    Encounter epic boss battles.
    Get the best scores with the online leaderboards.
    Easily learn the game with a tutorial level.
